This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS Setting border-left-style to none 
PASS Setting border-left-style to initial 
PASS Setting border-left-style to inherit 
PASS Setting border-left-style to unset 
PASS Setting border-left-style to invalid value CSSSimpleLength throws 
PASS Setting border-left-style to invalid value null throws 
PASS Setting border-left-style to invalid value undefined throws 
PASS Setting border-left-style to invalid value true throws 
PASS Setting border-left-style to invalid value false throws 
PASS Setting border-left-style to invalid value 1 throws 
PASS Setting border-left-style to invalid value hello throws 
PASS Setting border-left-style to invalid value [object Object] throws 
PASS Setting border-left-style to invalid value CSSKeywordValue throws 
PASS Getting border-left-style when it is set to none 
PASS Getting border-left-style when it is set to initial 
PASS Getting border-left-style when it is set to inherit 
PASS Getting border-left-style when it is set to unset 
PASS getAll for single-valued border-left-style 
PASS Delete border-left-style removes the value from the styleMap 
PASS border-left-style shows up in getProperties 
PASS Setting border-left-style to a sequence throws 
PASS Appending to border-left-style throws 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
